experiences.title: Student Government President
experiences.description: Leading 200+ student initiatives while pursuing Data Science degree. Actively working on computer vision projects using YOLO models, data annotation pipelines, and AI model training for practical applications.

experiences.title: Software Engineer

experiences.title: Senior Backend Developer
experiences.description: Led backend development for 3 major products serving 50K+ active users. Architected microservices infrastructure, reduced system latency by 40%, and mentored 5 junior developers in Java Spring and system design.

experiences.title: Early Career Progression
